titles.title: Lock Up Child Rapists Now Act of 2008
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide mandatory imprisonment for life for persons raping young children.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 5/14/2008--Introduced. Lock Up Child Rapists Now Act of 2008 - Amends the federal criminal code to impose a mandatory sentence of life imprisonment on any adult individual (age 18 or older) convicted of engaging in sexual intercourse with a child who is under the age of 12 years.
